entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Contrecoeur

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 06:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
